snippet.title: A look into Turing's Cathedral with George Dyson
snippet.description: George Dyson speaks to TechRepublic contributor Nicole Bremer Nash about some of the computing pioneers featured in his book Turing's Cathedral.

snippet.title: Steve Jobs' 100-year legacy: Humanizing technology
snippet.description: What will the legacy of Steve Jobs be a century from now? It won't have much to do with business or marketing. Learn what it will be and why.

snippet.title: NASA's manned space program needs a goal, destination, and timetable, experts say
snippet.description: In light of President Obama's recent elimination of NASA's planned moon missions, experts say the agency's manned space program needs a goal, a destination, and a timetable.
